languages.text: "Навигатор Ханн — благородная душа. Страшно представить, какому испытанию подвергся его дух в том злополучном странствии... И все же он исполнил свой долг".
"Navigator Hann is a noble soul. It is frightening to imagine the ordeal his spirit underwent on that ill-fated voyage... And still he did his duty."
languages.original_text: "Навигатор Ханн — благородная душа. Страшно представить, какому испытанию подвергся его дух в том злополучном странствии... И все же он исполнил свой долг".

traits.locale_text: "Navigator Hann is a noble soul. It is frightening to imagine the ordeal his spirit underwent on that ill-fated voyage... And still he did his duty."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Navigator Hann is a noble soul. It is frightening to imagine the ordeal his spirit underwent on that ill-fated voyage... And still he did his duty."

languages.text: “导航者汉恩有着高尚的灵魂。光是想象一下他在那场不幸的航行中遭受的精神折磨，就令人不寒而栗，但他依然履行了自己的职责。”
languages.original_text: "Navigator Hann is a noble soul. It is frightening to imagine the ordeal his spirit underwent on that ill-fated voyage... And still he did his duty."

traits.locale_text: “导航者汉恩有着高尚的灵魂。光是想象一下他在那场不幸的航行中遭受的精神折磨，就令人不寒而栗，但他依然履行了自己的职责。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Le navigateur Hann est noble de cœur. Je peine à imaginer ce que son esprit a dû endurer lors de ce voyage tragique... Et pourtant, ça ne l'a pas empêché d'accomplir son devoir. »
languages.original_text: "Navigator Hann is a noble soul. It is frightening to imagine the ordeal his spirit underwent on that ill-fated voyage... And still he did his duty."

traits.locale_text: « Le navigateur Hann est noble de cœur. Je peine à imaginer ce que son esprit a dû endurer lors de ce voyage tragique... Et pourtant, ça ne l'a pas empêché d'accomplir son devoir. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «El Navegante Hann es un alma noble. Me aterra pensar en el trance que atravesó su espíritu en ese fatídico viaje... pero cumplió con su deber».
languages.original_text: "Navigator Hann is a noble soul. It is frightening to imagine the ordeal his spirit underwent on that ill-fated voyage... And still he did his duty."

traits.locale_text: «El Navegante Hann es un alma noble. Me aterra pensar en el trance que atravesó su espíritu en ese fatídico viaje... pero cumplió con su deber».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「航宙士ハンは高貴な魂。あの不幸な航海で彼の精神が経験した試練を想像するのも恐ろしいことです…それでも彼は、己の聖務に従事しているのです」
languages.original_text: "Navigator Hann is a noble soul. It is frightening to imagine the ordeal his spirit underwent on that ill-fated voyage... And still he did his duty."

traits.locale_text: 「航宙士ハンは高貴な魂。あの不幸な航海で彼の精神が経験した試練を想像するのも恐ろしいことです…それでも彼は、己の聖務に従事しているのです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Navigator Hann ist eine noble Seele. Es ist ein schrecklicher Gedanke, welche Prüfungen sein Geist auf dieser schicksalhaften Reise erdulden musste ... Und dennoch hat er seine Pflicht getan."
languages.original_text: "Navigator Hann is a noble soul. It is frightening to imagine the ordeal his spirit underwent on that ill-fated voyage... And still he did his duty."

traits.locale_text: "Navigator Hann ist eine noble Seele. Es ist ein schrecklicher Gedanke, welche Prüfungen sein Geist auf dieser schicksalhaften Reise erdulden musste ... Und dennoch hat er seine Pflicht getan."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Navigator Hann is a noble soul. It is frightening to imagine the ordeal his spirit underwent on that ill-fated voyage... And still he did his duty."

languages.text: "Rotacı Hann, onurlu bir adammış. Talihsiz yolculuğunda ruhunun çektiği acıları hayal etmek tüylerimi ürpertiyor... Her şeye rağmen vazifesini yerine getirmiş bir de."
languages.original_text: "Navigator Hann is a noble soul. It is frightening to imagine the ordeal his spirit underwent on that ill-fated voyage... And still he did his duty."
